form_recognition_and_print.c

00012 #include <pob-eye.h>
00013 
00014 // Include bitmap list and dictionnary of forms
00015 #include "Bitmap.h" 
00016 #include "pattern.h"
00017 
00018 int main (void)
00019 {       
00020         UInt8 i=0,Nb_Identify=0;
00021         
00022         // List of form
00023         Form ListOfForm[MAX_OF_FORM];
00024 
00025         // Struct of three pointers on the RGB components
00026         UInt8 * FrameFromCam;
00027 
00028         //The pixels will be stocked in the LCD buffer
00029         UInt8 LCD_Buffer [LCD_WIDTH*LCD_HEIGHT*BITS] ;
00030         GraphicBuffer ScreenBuffer ;
00031 
00032         // System and LCD screen initialization
00033         InitPobeye2();
00034         InitI2C(I2C_100_KHZ);
00035         InitCameraPobeye2();
00036         InitLCD();      
00037 
00038         // Get the pointer of the red,green and blue video buffer
00039         FrameFromCam = GetRGBFrame();
00040                 
00041         // Init the Graphic buffer with 128 per 64, one pixel per bit and LCD_Buffer
00042         InitGraphicBuffer( &ScreenBuffer, LCD_WIDTH,LCD_HEIGHT,ONE_BIT,LCD_Buffer);
00043 
00044         // clear the graphic buffer
00045         ClearGraphicBuffer(&ScreenBuffer);
00046 
00047         while(1)
00048         {               
00049                 // grab the RGB components
00050                 GrabRGBFrame();                         
00051                 
00052                 // Binary the three RGB Buffer
00053                 BinaryRGBFrame(FrameFromCam); 
00054                 
00055                 // Try to identify the forms and make a list of it
00056                 Nb_Identify=IdentifyForm(FrameFromCam,ListOfForm,pattern);      
00057 
00058                 // Parse the list of the form and print result on the Pob-Terminal and the LCD Screen
00059                 for (i=0;i<Nb_Identify;i++)
00060                 {
00061                         switch (ListOfForm[i].id)
00062                         {
00063                         case IDP_0_CROSS:
00064                                 // Draw bitmap on the buffer and the LCD screen
00065                                 DrawBitmap(0,0,IDB_CROSS,bitmap,&ScreenBuffer);
00066                                 DrawLCD(&ScreenBuffer);
00067                         break;
00068                                 
00069                         case IDP_1_BIGA:
00070                                 DrawBitmap(0,0,IDB_BIGA,bitmap,&ScreenBuffer);
00071                                 DrawLCD(&ScreenBuffer);
00072                         break;
00073 
00074                         case IDP_2_KING:
00075                                 DrawBitmap(0,0,IDB_KING,bitmap,&ScreenBuffer);
00076                                 DrawLCD(&ScreenBuffer);
00077                         break;
00078 
00079                         case IDP_3_TOWER:
00080                                 DrawBitmap(0,0,IDB_TOWER,bitmap,&ScreenBuffer);
00081                                 DrawLCD(&ScreenBuffer);
00082                         break;
00083                         
00084                         case IDP_4_TREFLE:
00085                                 DrawBitmap(0,0,IDB_BIGA,bitmap,&ScreenBuffer);
00086                                 DrawLCD(&ScreenBuffer);
00087                         break;
00088                         
00089                         case IDP_5_TRIANGLE:
00090                                 DrawBitmap(0,0,IDB_TRIANGLE,bitmap,&ScreenBuffer);
00091                                 DrawLCD(&ScreenBuffer);
00092                         break;
00093                         default:
00094                         break;
00095                         }                               
00096                 }               
00097         if (Nb_Identify == 0)
00098                 {
00099                 DrawBitmap(0,0,IDB_NOFORMS,bitmap,&ScreenBuffer);
00100                 DrawLCD(&ScreenBuffer);
00101                 }
00102         }
00103         return 0;
00104 }
